General.Name: Shin Heung Energy & Electronics Co.Ltd
General.Description: Shin Heung Energy & Electronics Co.,Ltd. produces and sells lithium ion and polymer battery parts worldwide. The company provides small battery parts, such as cap assemblies, current interrupt devices, and strip terminals for cylindrical/prismatic/polymer batteries used in mobile phones, tablets, power tools, electric bicycles, electric vehicles, etc.; and large battery parts, including cap assemblies and cans for medium/large-size prismatic batteries used in electric vehicles and energy storage systems. It also offers prismatic/circular pack modules, which are used in the field of electric vehicles, electric buses, energy storage systems, uninterruptible power supply, etc. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Osan, South Korea.
